caption: A man lay on the ground, realizing he was surrounded by others. It was a mountainous area covered in white, suggesting it was covered in snow. Many wild people stood around him, pointing their spears at him. He was captured and couldn't escape.In another place, two women were in conversation. One of them appeared to be more animated, and she seemed quite pleased with the other woman. They were discussing past events. The older one reminisced about the past and confided in the younger girl.Meanwhile, in a campsite, two men were conversing in the darkness, leaning against a fence.
